title: Here's some professional advice from a noob.

replies.body: {{champion:27}} LIES!!!! LIES I SAY!
Dying is just a form of recalling
It's faster indeed
fast travel, some might say.

> [{quoted}](name=5000000000000000,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZcT4x4HA,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-04-12T08:49:30.385+0000)
>
> Dying is just a form of recalling

This persons's got it. ^^

> [{quoted}](name=Lord of Math,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZcT4x4HA,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-04-12T03:55:39.075+0000)
>
> {{champion:27}} LIES!!!! LIES I SAY!

{{champion:30}} HERESY! READY THE COMFY CUSHIONS!
BUT MUH CS...

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZcT4x4HA,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-12T03:53:51.655+0000)
>
> BUT MUH CS...

This got me gud for some reason :>

It would be funny if you were worth so little gold that the enemies CS counter goes up by 1 by killing you rather than their kill count lol.

{{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}
I would actually find that incredibly hillarious.
COWARD! Honorable death can open path to victory for your teammates! {{champion:14}}

> [{quoted}](name=remakoro,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZcT4x4HA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-04-12T11:25:39.070+0000)
>
> COWARD! Honorable death can open path to victory for your teammates! {{champion:14}}

{{champion:157}} ???? Is that you???

> [{quoted}](name=remakoro,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZcT4x4HA,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-04-12T11:25:39.070+0000)
>
> COWARD! Honorable death can open path to victory for your teammates! {{champion:14}}

*ults away in fear*

> [{quoted}](name=VIRTU0SO,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=ZcT4x4HA,comment-id=00030001,timestamp=2018-04-12T16:56:15.366+0000)
>
> *ults away in fear*

COWARDS!

What is i take them with me?
{{champion:14}} {{champion:30}}
Bs I have 13  hp I'll be fine
Yeah! I'll remember this for my next ARAM game!
But dying is a free recall
Dying is when I shop? That way I can get back out to you wonderful people as soon as my Delayed Recall is up.
{{champion:34}}  caw?
In silver, someone dies greeding every single game. To them, grabbing that one last minion is worth dying for.
Unless you can take this juicy side inhibitor.

Actually, depending on the level, and the situation, it *might actually be better to get yourself executed than to recall*.

If you get executed by turret, that instantly removes the chance for them to get gold off of you. And at very early levels, revive time is faster than recall time.
I love you.
